reviewText: I have been dancing since at least 2003/2004 and even though I became part of our Belly Dance Performance group and was brought up to the intermediate class we did not work on combinations like Leyla teaches....since I came across Leyla's site I have learned so much from her and I have definitely become a better dancer!  My form is better, my hip movements are sharper, crisper and more controlled.......Allison
